(4223x1+0)/1 mod 8192 = 4223. (4223x3+1)/2 mod 4096 = 2239. (4223x9+5)/4 mod 2048 = 1311. (4223x27+19)/8 mod 1024 = 943. (4223x81+65)/16 mod 512 = 391. (4223x243+211)/32 mod 256 = 75. (4223x729+665)/64 mod 128 = 113. (4223x2187+2059)/128 mod 64 = 42. (4223x2187+2059)/256 mod 32 = 21. (4223x6561+6433)/512 mod 16 = 0. (4223x6561+6433)/1024 mod 8 = 0. (4223x6561+6433)/2048 mod 4 = 0. (4223x6561+6433)/4096 mod 2 = 0. (4223x6561+6433)/8192 mod 1 = 0.
